snippet: Commissioner Don Garber said Thursday that Chivas USA may not play during the 2015 season, even if Major League Soccer finds a new owner for the club.
abstract: Major League Soccer unveiled new logos for the league and its teams, but acknowledges that troubled franchise Chivas USA may not play during 2015 season even if MLS finds a new owner for the club.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Don Garber said Thursday that Chivas USA may not play during the 2015 season, even if Major League Soccer finds a new owner for the club.

headline.main: New-Look M.L.S. Considers a Season Without Chivas USA
headline.print_headline: New-Look M.L.S. Considers a Season Without Chivas USA
